selections.name: Cathal (ire)
selections.reason: Top Speed Figure (119) dominates this field. With the scratch of #1, the race shape favors his stalking style.

selections.name: Pacific Quest
selections.reason: Speed Figure (111) is second best. Likely to control the pace or sit close in a void scenario.

selections.name: Smooth Salute
selections.reason: Consistent Speed (114) and Class (94). A reliable board hitter.

danger_horse.name: Ya'll Come
danger_horse.reason: Speed (106) makes him a threat if the top two falter.

selections.name: Babe Ruthless
selections.reason: Massive Speed advantage (116) vs field average (~100). Looks like a single.

selections.name: Irish Element
selections.reason: Speed (109) is clearly second best. The logical exacta partner.

selections.name: Goodbye Dal
selections.reason: Speed (101) puts him in the mix for third.

danger_horse.name: Love Da Gig
danger_horse.reason: Speed (100) is competitive for the minor awards.

selections.name: A. P. Again
selections.reason: Top Speed (106) and strong recent form (won last out).

selections.name: Very Quiet
selections.reason: Speed (104) is very competitive. Consistent runner.

selections.name: Flashy Fritz
selections.reason: Speed (94) is a step below but has back class.

danger_horse.name: Petrakos
danger_horse.reason: Speed (98) puts him in the mix for the bottom of exotics.

selections.name: Syntax
selections.reason: Highest Speed (112) in the field. Looks ready to break maiden.

selections.name: All In The Game
selections.reason: Speed (107) is solid. Good second place finish last time.

selections.name: Turkey Bird
selections.reason: Matches #2 with Speed (107). Consistent figures.

danger_horse.name: Joyful Mischief
danger_horse.reason: Speed (102) is respectable, could pick up pieces.

selections.name: Robin With A Why
selections.reason: Top Speed (112) indicates a slight edge over the favorite. Value play.

selections.name: Pura Vida Princesa
selections.reason: Speed (109) and Class (105). Very consistent, the one to beat.

selections.name: Lubie's Music
selections.reason: Speed (107) and Class (114). Drops in class effectively.

danger_horse.name: Prestige Fungson
danger_horse.reason: Speed (109) matches the favorite. Live contender.

selections.name: Subtle Knowledge
selections.reason: Speed (99) is the best recent figure in a weak field.

selections.name: Tom's Star
selections.reason: Speed (97) and consistent form. Logical contender.

selections.name: Smiling Rapper
selections.reason: Speed (93) puts her in the mix for exotics.

danger_horse.name: Play For Me
danger_horse.reason: First time starter in a weak field is always dangerous.

selections.name: Hey Nay Nay (ire)
selections.reason: Grade 3 Winner with Top Speed (116) and Class (115). The class of the field.

selections.name: Greenwich Village
selections.reason: Speed (114) and strong maiden win. Improving rapidly.

selections.name: Cal's Goal
selections.reason: Speed (116) matches the top pick. Very fast.

danger_horse.name: Later Than Planned (ire)
danger_horse.reason: Speed (110) makes him a player for the lower rungs.

selections.name: Berlin Wall
selections.reason: Speed (110) and Class (110). Proven back class and speed.

selections.name: Team Player
selections.reason: Speed (110) matches top pick. In good form.

selections.name: Left Hand Man
selections.reason: Speed (110). Another contender with top figures in a tight race.

danger_horse.name: Stolen Treasure
danger_horse.reason: Speed (109) is right there with the top group.

selections.name: Essos
selections.reason: Top Speed (109). Looks ready to break maiden at this distance.

selections.name: Army Man
selections.reason: Speed (108). Good second place finish last out.

selections.name: Charlie's Curlin
selections.reason: Speed (108) and Class (109). Competitive figures.
